titleStmt.title: Honors pedigree, or, The [se]veral fountaines of gentry [be]ing a treatise of the distinct degrees of the nobilitie of this kingdome, with their rights and priviledges, according to the lawes and customes of England / [by] that juditious lawyer, Sir John Dodoredge ...
titleStmt.author: Doddridge, John, Sir, 1555-1628.

titleStmt.title: Honors pedigree, or, The [se]veral fountaines of gentry [be]ing a treatise of the distinct degrees of the nobilitie of this kingdome, with their rights and priviledges, according to the lawes and customes of England / [by] that juditious lawyer, Sir John Dodoredge ...

notesStmt.note: Binding obscures left margin of t.p.; bracketed letters in title supplied from NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
